Articles.Content: Is there a way I can attach explosives to my rocket, so in a worst case scenario when my rocket loses control, I can hit a button and the thing explodes before coming back to earth?

There's a few mods that do this by applying phantom forces to your ship of increasing magnitude, but honestly, if you lose control all you need to do is stage a few times and your rocket will fantastically fly apart.
Use a mod called TAC Self Destruct.

You could have some sort of mechanism of sepratron-missiles that fire into a stage. That's one possible way, of many. But as Killerblonde stated, a planned-unplanned disassembly usually is the best way to go.
